content: We then go to Jinbe and Shirahoshi who are on Megalo headed for the plaza, the princess worries for her father, but Jinbe assures her they will think of something. All across the island, citizens hurry to the plaza. Jinbe and Shirahoshi are also on their way there when the princess spots what she thinks is Neptune when really, it's a batch of balloons shaped liked him with the sound of his voice playing from it.
